resources.string: A large-sized dog with a fierce personality. Its coat color is mostly iron-clad gold, yellow, black (black is not pure black, but slightly white hair on the chest and limbs), etc. It is native to the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau.
A kind of sharp-mouthed dog, strong, and sports-loving breed. It was used as a dog fire guard dog in Japan, and now it has become a very popular family dog all over the world.
A breed born in 1860 after more than 100 years of selection and breeding in the UK based on the native longhair cats of Afghanistan and the Angora longhair cats of Turkey.

In history, it was called the Achiange Blue Cat, and it had three different names. At first it was the Achianji blue cat. It was not named the Russian blue cat until the 1940s, and for a while it was called the Maltese cat.
The reptiles of the Chamaeleontidae (Chamaeleontidae) of the Sauria suborder (Sauria) are native to the Eastern Hemisphere and are mainly arboreal. It is characterized by changes in body color.
A semi-aquatic, semi-dwelling, semi-terrestrial reptile. Mainly inhabit rivers, lakes, reservoirs, ponds and other waters.
